duksan@duksan-main ~ % {
duksan@duksan-main ~ cursh>   echo "=== OS / Kernel ==="; uname -a; cat /etc/os-release | sed -n '1,6p'
duksan@duksan-main ~ cursh>   echo; echo "=== CPU ==="; lscpu
duksan@duksan-main ~ cursh>   echo; echo "=== Memory (summary) ==="; free -h
duksan@duksan-main ~ cursh>   echo; echo "=== Motherboard / BIOS ==="; sudo dmidecode -t baseboard -t bios
duksan@duksan-main ~ cursh>   echo; echo "=== Memory (slots/modules) ==="; sudo dmidecode -t memory
duksan@duksan-main ~ cursh>   echo; echo "=== GPU ==="; lspci | grep -iE 'vga|3d|display' || true
duksan@duksan-main ~ cursh>   which nvidia-smi >/dev/null && { echo; nvidia-smi; } || echo "(NVIDIA nvidia-smi ì—†ìŒ)"
duksan@duksan-main ~ cursh>   echo; echo "=== Disks / Partitions ==="; lsblk -o NAME,SIZE,MODEL,SERIAL,TYPE,FSTYPE,MOUNTPOINT
duksan@duksan-main ~ cursh>   echo; echo "=== Network ==="; ip -br a
duksan@duksan-main ~ cursh> } | tee "$OUT"

# TS: src/utils/time.ts (ì¡´ì¬ ì‹œ ë®ì–´ì“°ì§€ ì•ŠìŒ)
TS_TIME="src/utils/time.ts"
mkdir -p "$(dirname "$TS_TIME")"

/** Canonical time helpers (KST) â€” no external deps */
export const KST_TZ = "Asia/Seoul";
export function nowKST(): Date { return new Date(new Date().toLocaleString("en-US", { timeZone: KST_TZ })); }
export function fmtKSTHuman(d = nowKST()): string {
  return new Intl.DateTimeFormat("ko-KR",{ timeZone: KST_TZ, year:"numeric", month:"2-digit", day:"2-digit", hour:"2-digit", minute:"2-digit"}).format(d).replace(/\./g,".").replace(/\s/g," ").replace(/ $/,"");
}
export function fmtKSTISO(d = nowKST()): string {
  // ISO8601 with +09:00 offset
  const z = new Intl.DateTimeFormat("en-GB",{ timeZone: KST_TZ, hour12:false, year:"numeric", month:"2-digit", day:"2-digit", hour:"2-digit", minute:"2-digit", second:"2-digit" }).formatToParts(d)
    .reduce((a,p)=> (a[p.type]=p.value, a), {} as Record<string,string>);
  const iso = `${z.year}-${z.month}-${z.day}T${z.hour}:${z.minute}:${z.second}+09:00`;
  return iso;
}
TS
  echo "[added] $TS_TIME"
fi

from datetime import datetime
from zoneinfo import ZoneInfo  # Python 3.9+
KST = ZoneInfo("Asia/Seoul")
def now_kst_iso():
    return datetime.now(KST).isoformat()
def now_kst_human():
    return datetime.now(KST).strftime("%Y-%m-%d %H:%M KST")
PY

fi

# === Gumgang 2.0 â€” STATE SNAPSHOT (frontend+backend+rules+ports) ===
set -euo pipefail
BASE="${HOME}/ë°”íƒ•í™”ë©´/gumgang_0_5/gumgang-v2"

{

echo

echo

echo "=== BUNDLE/BUILD ARTIFACTS ==="
OUTDIR=""; for d in dist .next build; do [ -d "$d" ] && OUTDIR="$d" && break; done
echo "bundle dir: ${OUTDIR:-none}"
if [ -n "$OUTDIR" ]; then
  BYTES=$(find "$OUTDIR" -type f -printf "%s\n" | awk '{s+=$1} END{print s+0}')
  MB=$(awk -v b="$BYTES" 'BEGIN{printf "%.2f", b/1048576}')
  echo "bundle total: ${MB} MB"
  find "$OUTDIR" -type f | head -n 10
fi

echo "=== TS ERRORS (.tsc.out snapshot) ==="

  sed -n '1,40p' .tsc.out
fi

echo "=== FILE STATS (quick) ==="

echo "Python under backend/: $(find backend -type f -name '*.py' 2>/dev/null | wc -l | tr -d ' ')"
echo "Node modules present?: $( [ -d node_modules ] && echo yes || echo no )"
} | tee "$OUT"

echo "ğŸ“„ Saved: $OUT"

} | tee "$OUT"
